website_summaries.verdict: For kids who love Peppa Pig and plush toys, this is an excellent choice that won't break your budget.
pros: An adorable plush Peppa Pig toy made by the popular Ty Beanie Babies company
Comes in several characters from the TV show
cons: A few consumers gripe about size issues – some received dolls that were smaller or larger than advertised
Some dolls came without the Ty tag

customer_reviews.title: Smallish in size but it's Peppa Pig.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece as she's obsess with Peppa Pig. Was hoping the size was bigger than it actually is, not satisfied there and my niece wished it was bigger too. but never the less, it's Pegga Pig, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jaundoo

customer_reviews.title: Looks bad/fake
customer_reviews.text: Seems fake as it just doesn’t look like Peppa. The dimensions are all wrong. Also it did not arrive with a tag of Ty, so this also adds to the impression that this is fake.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and larger than I imagined.
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old grandson is really getting into Peppa Pig, so I sent this to him as a gift. My son reports that it's been a real hit with him, which I could see for myself when we skyped later. Great quality, and larger than I imagined, the perfect size for a 2-year-old!
customer_reviews.author: R. Carol

customer_reviews.title: Where is the TY tag?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas! She happens to just LOVE Peppa Pig. However, the TY tag is missing? I looked inside the package assuming it came off during transport. No such luck. A little upset. My daughter is 2, and won't know the difference, however, I purchased "new" meaning the "TY" tag would be on the doll. Anyways, it appears as described minus the tag.
customer_reviews.author: aubreylynn

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Beenie for my Baby
customer_reviews.text: My 18month old is a Peppa lover, and she loves this Peppa more than all her toys combined. Im going to have to order a few more as shes going to wear this poor Peppa out.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamS.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little Peppa lover!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good quality. Our little girl, who loves Peppa is very happy with this. She loves to take it with her in the car. Wish there were more characters!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly great!
customer_reviews.text: I was more than pleased with this peppa pig, I could say it is quite small, but is nice size for my 5 years old daughter... however this Peppa is soooooo cute... The materials feels really smooth and great quality, the embrodery is nice, and most important it really looks like the cartoon... Great plush, nicely done and very lovable!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A Elenes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what is pictured pictured. I got it for a co-worker, and she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Bear falls off fast.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it!!! The tiny bear fell off the first week though but the quality of peppa still remains good.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be NOT the real Ty Beanie
customer_reviews.text: The toy that showed up is similar to the one on the picture, but not as shown, and does not appear to be the real Ty Beanie. I also purchased George, that is the Ty Beanie and this one has different characteristics. It does not have the Ty Beanie paper heart. I am disappointed - my kid doesn't care, the toy looks like Peppa Pig, but it matters to me if it's a real thing or a knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kochmar

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was bigger. I am keeping it but it is really small to the amount of money paid!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: If your little one loves Peppa Pig, this would be a good choice!
customer_reviews.text: The little one loves Peppa Pig (who doesn't??) and the next step was to get her one she could hold on to! This little Peppa is just the right size (about 6" sitting - her tiny legs don't let her stand!) for a small baby to hold on to and walk around without being unbalanced. Good quality and was instantly recognized as Peppa! Now if only this one said some phrases from the show... =)
customer_reviews.author: Kaizoku!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great buy have had it for over 2 years now and still in great shape with a 2yr old now 4yr old having trucked them all around.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Aurelius

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good workmanship. She loves it. Kida small for the price but we're good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ophoff

customer_reviews.title: Great size but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: My daughter carries Peppa everywhere and its the perfect size for travel, snuggling and bed time. Peppa was a bit overpriced compared to George.
customer_reviews.author: Sportzchck

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size, about the size of a beanie boo
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great size, my cousins baby will love it !
customer_reviews.text: What arrived was a good sized peppa PLUSH. 😀(Not keychain) It has the Ty tag on it (not that'd I'd care . It's for a baby. As long as it was at a good price and looked like the cartoon was my concern. Parents have too much time on their hands lol.) My cousins baby will love it !!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It's Peppa
customer_reviews.text: Perfect piggy for our 2 year old. She loves the shows, books, plastic and stuffed animals. Not too big and not too small. Perfect for her little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Walton

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little toy
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little toy, grandson loves it, goes to bed with him every night. The service was fast, many thanks, highly recommend. A+A+A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Peppa!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. This was a gift for a friend and it was very authentic looking, great sized and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size to take along in the car or the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 21 months old and absolutely adores her Peppa Plush. It's the perfect size to take along in the car or the store and to place in my purse once her attention span has been used up without taking up too much space. This product is absolutely fantastic and I'd recommend it for any parent who has a child that loves watching the show.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McKeon

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 year old son loves Peppa Pig and he loved this stuffed Peppa for his birthday
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves Peppa Pig and he loved this stuffed Peppa for his birthday! It's sturdy and adorable and a great size for him to carry around!
customer_reviews.author: Leahjane

customer_reviews.title: Delighted daughter
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find any reasonably priced Peppa toys this side of "the pond". 4-yr old daughter was delighted to open this doll for Christmas this morning, in fact she seemed a bit in shock to find Peppa in her arms. Soft, cute, simple and relatively small, which is nice in a home besieged with stuffed animals. She is pushing Peppa around in her doll stroller as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: Lalalalaleesa

customer_reviews.title: Order not correct
customer_reviews.text: I ordered what I thought would be a decent sized Peppa, as there were no choices as to which character I would get, but instead got a tiny George. My daughter likes it regardless but was not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and is just her size and showed up right on time. She didnt put it down for a week haha
customer_reviews.author: scarecrow

customer_reviews.title: It’s Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an add on to a birthday gift for a little girl. She loved it! It cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love Peppa Pig, and this is a fantastic quality Beanie Baby!
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonQueen19

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous when I ordered this because others had said in the reviews that the item the received was not the one pictured. This was not the case for me. The item arrived exactly as described and pictured. It was the regular size of a Ty Beanie Baby. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My little brother loved her! We ordered George for him as well and can’t wait for that plushie to come as well! The plushie itself is very soft and came in well packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and authentic. Perfect quality and shipping. Exactly as pictured. My daughter will love her! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: fitmomof4

customer_reviews.title: Just got this and my daugther loves it! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and my daugther loves it! I didnt expect this small. Its smaller than the 500ml bottle water. But rather than that its a cute stuff toy and the impt is my daugther loves it! Fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MsHawaii🌺

customer_reviews.title: ... the Peppa Pig show and this beanie baby is perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a big fan of the Peppa Pig show and this beanie baby is perfect for her. I got her both George and Peppa and they are both good.
customer_reviews.author: User of things

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Peppa Pig fan in your house.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! The little legs and detail on Teddy are perfect. It is about the size out a standard water bottle. My son loves it and sleeps with it every night. We are big fans of Peppa Pig in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Hanne Leon

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: we have been looking everywhere for a peppa pig stuffed toy, found it here on amazon , it is ty , great quality , my daughter loves it, perfect size to take along the only thing is, they now have the same exact one at Kmart for less .
customer_reviews.author: NELWERR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Piggy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable Peppa. This arrived quickly and in perfect condition. The tags were perfectly intact and is a true Ty product. I cannot wait to give this to my daughter this weeknd! She is going to love it! It is the perfect size for my toddler to tote around. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Clack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived as described. My niece loves Peppa and this plush was a hit
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Cute for small child
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves her peppa! It is smaller than expected, which was slightly disappointing. However, the small size makes it easier for her to carry around and sleep with. Great for this age as an older child may not get as much enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: It's so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my daughter, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Peppa, the size is as advertised and she carries her with her everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Megan williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece whose 3 was so happy to get this for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Caljay

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. There is a severe lack of Peppa Pig merchandise available in the US, and I was happy to see the price on this was not ridiculous. Peppa is slightly larger than George, and a normal Beanie Baby size. The Ty tags were all on and it is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: LC9919Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for Peppa fans!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a granddaughter who loves Peppa Pig. She carries it around and seems to like it very much. It seems well made and is soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Knoxgirl

customer_reviews.title: Makes an excellent little sleep partner
customer_reviews.text: Extremely soft and cute curly tail. Makes an excellent little sleep partner.
customer_reviews.author: charkle2

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product is much smaller than it appears on the website. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: hidolphin33

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it. She is a huge Peppa Pig fan
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it. She is a huge Peppa Pig fan,
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Peppa Pig?
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, just like the show! #1 Granddaughter thinks it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality beanie toy. Nice details. Surpassed all my expectations for the price of 5.95. Would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Peppa was for my granddaughter and it has been well loved. The quality is superb and it has been ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described. Peppa was for my granddaughter and it has been well loved. The quality is superb and it has been a great toy for my little one. I was nice to be able to find her on Amazon. Where I live, Peppa the Pig is not easily found. I would buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Peppa Pig and this one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: monacr

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy & nice
customer_reviews.text: My 23 Month girl liked it, Very soft and lovable plush.
customer_reviews.author: Marc. R.

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pig!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old who loves this show! He adores Peppa Pig and that she is holding her "Teddy" too.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my neice is a fan of peppa pig, george and dinosaur...RRRRR!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, that's all it takes to give five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

product_meta.title: Ty Beanie Babies Peppa Pig - reg
product_meta.description: The world famous Beanie Babies are forever filled with fun! Ultra iconic, ever loved. Ty Beanie Babies are the best!
feature_bullets: Official product from Ty's wildly popular Beanie Babies Collection
Look for the familiar heart-shaped tag that means you've purchased an authentic Ty product
Handmade with the finest quality standards in the industry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,147 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
